text: Q27.| Consider the following two schedules involving three transactions: S1: r1(A), r2(B), r3(C), r1(B), r2(C), r3(D), w1(A), w2(B), w3(C), w1(A), c1,c2,c3 S2: r1(A), r2(B), r3(C), r1(B), r2(C), r3(A), w1(A), w2(B), c2, w3(C), c3, wl(A), cl â€˜Which one of the following statement is TRUE (a) Only S1 is possible under strict 2PL (b) Only S2 is possible under strict 2PL (c) Both S1 and S2 are possible under strict 2PL (d) Both S1 and S2 are not possible under strict 2PL
